tool_description: Expands queries with synonyms, related terms, and alternative phrasings to improve search coverage and recall.

original_keywords.description: Original keywords from the parsed query

expansion_method.description: Method for expansion: semantic, thesaurus, or statistical

max_expansions.description: Maximum number of expansion terms to generate

domain.description: Domain context for specialized expansion (general, technical, medical, legal)

error_messages: Invalid expansion method error: Method must be one of: semantic, thesaurus, statistical.
Keywords array empty error: At least one keyword must be provided.
Max expansions out of range error: Max expansions must be between 1 and 100.
Domain not supported error: Domain must be one of: general, technical, medical, legal.
usage: Provide the original keywords array from query parsing. Optionally specify expansion method, maximum expansions, and domain context. Returns expanded terms with confidence scores.

expanded_terms.description: Additional terms related to original keywords

confidence_scores.description: Confidence scores for each expanded term (0-1)

expansion_count.description: Total number of terms added through expansion
